movies.title: Secret Wars
movies.plot: After many controversies Poland's biggest military intelligence and counter-intelligence agency (commonly known as WSI) is liquidated, but its place is immediately taken by a new, secret military organization. Forced to deal with obscure cases, Its three members soon begin to doubt both their mission and the people they work for.
movies.simplePlot: After many controversies Poland's biggest military intelligence and counter-intelligence agency (commonly known as WSI) is liquidated, but its place is immediately taken by a new, secret ...

biography.bio: Kamilla Baar was born on October 6, 1979 in Czluchów, Pomorskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Nadzieja (2007), Na dobre i na zle (1999) and Dans l'abîme de Gibraltar (2009).
biography.name: Kamilla Baar

biography.bio: Olga Boladz was born on February 29, 1984 in Torun, Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler (2009), Life, Above All (2012) and The Girl from the Wardrobe (2012).
biography.name: Olga Boladz

biography.bio: Tomasz Budyta was born on August 9, 1957 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Labirynt (1989), Faustyna (1994) and L'homme du peuple (2013).
biography.name: Tomasz Budyta

biography.bio: Janusz Chabior was born on February 17, 1963 in Legnica, Dolnoslaskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Made in Poland (2010), Last Floor (2013) and Symmetry (2003).
biography.name: Janusz Chabior

biography.bio: Katarzyna Czapla was born on April 1, 1985. She is an actress, known for Pitbull. New orders (2016), These Daughters of Mine (2015) and Secret Wars (2014).
biography.name: Katarzyna Czapla

biography.bio: Jan Frycz was born on May 15, 1954 in Kraków, Malopolskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for The Welts (2004), The Collector (2005) and Justice aveugle(ment) (2006).
biography.name: Jan Frycz

biography.bio: Born on March 15, 1952 in Chrzanów, Poland. Has two brothers: Mikolaj Grabowski who is an actor and director, and Wiktor who is a mining engineer. Graduated from Ludwik Solski Academy for the Dramatic Arts in Kraków. Worked in Juliusz Slowacki Theatre in Kraków. His most popular role is Ferdynand Kiepski in the long-running sitcom series Swiat wedlug Kiepskich (1999). In addition to acting he works as a singer and stand-up comedian. He often appears in shows performed for Teatr Telewizji, a series of theater performances broadcast by the public broadcaster Telewizja Polska. He was married to actress Anna Tomaszewska, they have two daughters: Zuzanna Grabowska (born in 1983) and Katarzyna Grabowska (born in 1991), both of whom are actresses. In June 2009 he married make-up artist Anita Kruszewska.
biography.name: Andrzej Grabowski

biography.bio: Jaroslaw Jablonski was born on April 28, 1977 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Secret Wars (2014), Pitbull: Tough Women (2016) and Rys (2007).
biography.name: Jaroslaw Jablonski

biography.bio: Aldona Jankowska was born on April 2, 1964 in Poznan, Wielkopolskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for In the Box (2003), Kochaj! (2016) and Last Minute (2013).
biography.name: Aldona Jankowska

biography.bio: Joanna Jezewska was born on December 15, 1965 in Gdynia, Pomorskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Rozmowy o milosci (1991), Far from the Other (1995) and M jak milosc (2000).
biography.name: Joanna Jezewska

biography.bio: Jan Jurewicz was born on October 20, 1954 in Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Schindler's List (1993), L'interrogatoire (1982) and Day of the Wacko (2002).
biography.name: Jan Jurewicz

biography.bio: Beata Kawka was born on September 7, 1967 in Szubin, Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland as Beata Aleksandra Kawka. She is an actress and writer, known for Tout ira bien (2007), Jasne blekitne okna (2007) and Samo zycie (2002).
biography.name: Beata Kawka

biography.bio: Artur Kazmiruk was born on September 6, 1980 in Chelm, Lubelskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Polish Legends: The Dragon (2015), Secret Wars (2014) and The Erlprince (2016).
biography.name: Artur Kazmiruk

biography.bio: Paulina Klimaszewska is an actress, known for BrzydUla (2008), Secret Wars (2014) and Reguly gry (2012).
biography.name: Paulina Klimaszewska

biography.bio: Agata Kulesza was born on September 27, 1971 in Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Ida (2013), La chambre des suicidés (2011) and Rose (2011). She has been married to Marcin Figurski since 2006. They have one child.
biography.name: Agata Kulesza
